title: Crystals for a Digital Detox | Shungite for EMF Sensitivity
description: Our lives get more & more digital by the day! Smartphones in everyone's pocket, tablets, smart appliances, multiple routers in our homes, wearable tech, TVs, e-readers and more equal a daily bombardment of EMFs (electromagnetic frequencies). The stone you need is Shungite. Touted as the miracle stone of the 21st ce
